#summary Things to remember
#labels TheFlow,Checklist

=== Release ===

 * [ ] Update version
   * `module.py`
   * `setup.py`
   * `doc/*`
 * [ ] Update ChangeLog
   * `CHANGELOG`
   * `README`
 * [ ] Update Documentation
   * `*.py` docstrings
   * `doc/*`
   * Wiki pages
 * [ ] Upload to PyPI
{{{
python setup.py sdist upload
}}}

=== Level Up ===

 * [ ] Runnable
   * python -m module
 * [ ] Python 2/3 compatible
   * python2 -m module
   * python3 -m module
